definition: taboo/to avoid as taboo/to abstain from
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
to avoid mentioning/taboo word/name of deceased emperor or superior

sentences.english: A section of defeat's sentiment most abstains from is, never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 壹段失敗的感情最忌諱的便是，念念不忘。

sentences.english: To the village doctor's wife it was taboo .
sentences.chinese: 這對本鎮的醫生太太來說是最忌諱的。

sentences.english: People often avoid to mention "death" in chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中文裏，人們通常是忌諱用“死”字的。

sentences.english: Until recently, mental illness is a taboo topic in China.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，在中國精神疾病仍然是一個忌諱的話題。

sentences.english: Do NOT be afraid to make a pass back to your defenders or GK if options in front are limited.
sentences.chinese: 前方沒有機會時，不要忌諱回傳給後衛或守門員。

sentences.english: Important things to avoid, such as aggravating disputants or imposing improper blocks, will be shared.
sentences.chinese: 最忌諱的就是加重激怒爭論者或強迫性的凍結。

sentences.english: This is Xia You's taboo, should be timely.
sentences.chinese: 這是夏遊地忌諱，應實時出水。

sentences.english: And you were unsure that it was offensive beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 而事前你並不清楚這對客戶來說是一件忌諱的事。

sentences.english: Procrastination is the enemy of accounting data input.
sentences.chinese: 財務數據輸入最忌諱的就是拖沓。

sentences.english: In addition, questions about religious beliefs are also considered taboo for westerners.
sentences.chinese: 也有些西方人很忌諱別人打聽他們的宗教信仰。

sentences.english: And that is the one big taboo of our age.
sentences.chinese: 而且這也是我們同齡人的一個大忌諱。

sentences.english: The visibility of racing pigeons undoubtedly is one of the biggest taboo.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的能見度對賽鴿來講無疑是一種最大的忌諱。

sentences.english: In literary and artistic creation, repetition and imitation should be avoided as taboos.
sentences.chinese: 重複和模仿是文藝創作中最忌諱的。

sentences.english: Xiangzi had been brought up in a northern village where cursing was taboo.
sentences.chinese: 祥子生在北方的鄉間，最忌諱隨便罵街。

sentences.english: It may not be as taboo as you think.
sentences.chinese: 或許你並不認爲這是種忌諱。
不必忌諱富含碳水化合物的食物。

definition: to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
